meanings.definition: A unit of area equal to 10 ares or 1000 square meters.
meanings.sent1: The field measured five decares in size.
meanings.sent2: The farmer owned several decares of land for cultivation.
meanings.sent3: The decares of land were so vast that the farmer got lost in his own property.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening spread across her decares of land like wildflowers in bloom.
meanings.sent5: The decares of land stretched out like a green carpet under the clear blue sky.
